Immigration Documents: Take the IELTS/CELPIP Exams for English Literacy
Get all relevant documents copied and certified
Arrange and Collect birth and marriage certificates
Ensure passports are up to date
Children: Ensure children have the necessary documentation as well as parents
Give notice to the school about the move
Make sure children are vaccinated and have documentation

Renting: Find a car rental location to rent a car in the new location
Pick a rental car and set up a rental for your arrival
Bringing: Obtain all documents relevant for the vehicle (Registration, insurance, etc)

Pets: Make sure to have Pet Documentation as needed by your travel agency, such as vaccination records
Get Pet Passports cleared for flight
Make sure they have all needed and relevant shots
Have the vaccination records on file for all pets
Phone: Cancel or modify your existing plan with your current cell company
Find a phone plan that fits your new needs in the new location
Realtor: Find a realtor near your current location to sell your home
Go through the process of selling your house
Find a realtor in your new location to buy a new home in your location
Find a house to purchase and go through that
default: Downsize belongings and get rid of what is not needed or wanted in the new location
Compile goods to accompany and goods to follow list
Get quotes for shipping goods to new location
landlord: Give notice to landlord and terminate lease
